categories.label: Industry Analysis
categories.description: Deep-dive analyses by industry frameworks (MICS/PICS) and capital markets views.

prompts.name: Capital Market Perspective
prompts.description: Geo/industry composition, valuation multiples, and TSR performance for a selected industry.

preview.markdown:
## Capital Market Perspective
Include market cap composition, TSR, forward P/E and EV/EBITDA ranges.

instructions.markdown: Prefer weighted-average plus median views; footnote data sources.

prompts.name: Industry Perspective (Quick)
prompts.description: Fast snapshot of industry composition and relative performance.

preview.markdown:
## Quick Industry Perspective
- Geo & industry composition snapshot
- Headline TSR & multiples

instructions.markdown: Enable **Web URL Integration** for freshest metrics.

prompts.name: TSR by Industry
prompts.description: Compare TSR by sub-industry and quartiles.

preview.markdown:
### TSR by Industry
- Rank industries by 1Y/3Y/5Y TSR; highlight outliers.

instructions.markdown: Turn on **Chart Rendering** to see quartile bands.

prompts.name: Industry Perspective (MICS / PICS)
prompts.description: Summarize structure, profitability, growth, and transparency using MICS/PICS taxonomy.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Perspective (MICS/PICS)
- Value chain & profit pools
- KPI benchmarks
- Change drivers

instructions.markdown: Highlight 5â€“7 KPIs that truly move valuation for this industry.

prompts.name: Capital Allocation
prompts.description: Analyze how companies in an industry allocate capital between capex, R&D, M&A, and shareholder returns.

preview.markdown:
### Capital Allocation Analysis
- Breakdown of capital deployment (Capex, R&D, M&A)
- Shareholder return patterns (dividends, buybacks)
- Capital efficiency metrics (ROIC, CROCI)

instructions.markdown: Enable Web URL Integration to fetch the latest financial data. Use Chart Rendering for visualizations.

prompts.name: Analyst Sentiment (Curated)
prompts.description: Summarize curated analyst sentiment, including ratings distribution and price target trends for an industry.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Analyst Sentiment
- Aggregate Buy/Hold/Sell distribution
- Average price target and upside
- Recent rating changes across the industry

instructions.markdown: Specify an industry to see aggregate sentiment. Results are based on a curated list of analysts.

prompts.name: Charting (Curated List)
prompts.description: Generate a list of curated, presentation-ready charts for a given industry.

preview.markdown:
### Curated Industry Charts
- Market Size & Growth
- Profitability vs. Growth Matrix
- Valuation Multiples vs. Peers

instructions.markdown: Enable Chart Rendering to generate the visuals. The list of charts is curated for maximum impact.

prompts.name: Expectations
prompts.description: Summarize consensus expectations for an industry's key performance indicators (KPIs).

preview.markdown:
### Industry Expectations
- Consensus revenue growth estimates
- Expected margin expansion/contraction
- Key KPI forecasts (e.g., user growth, pricing)

instructions.markdown: Requires Web URL Integration to fetch the latest consensus data.

prompts.name: Industry KPIs
prompts.description: Identify and benchmark key performance indicators (KPIs) for a specific industry.

preview.markdown:
### Key Industry KPIs
- List of the most important KPIs for the industry
- Benchmark values (e.g., top quartile, median)
- Recent trends in KPI performance

instructions.markdown: This prompt provides a fundamental overview of what drives value in an industry.

prompts.name: Multiples
prompts.description: Analyze valuation multiples for an industry, including historical trends and peer comparisons.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Valuation Multiples
- Historical P/E, EV/EBITDA, and P/S ranges
- Comparison vs. a benchmark index
- Current multiples relative to history

instructions.markdown: Enable Chart Rendering for historical multiple charts.

prompts.name: News & Trends
prompts.description: Summarize the latest news and emerging trends affecting a given industry.

preview.markdown:
### Industry News & Trends
- Key headlines from the last 30 days
- Emerging technological, regulatory, or consumer trends
- M&A activity and rumors

instructions.markdown: Requires Web URL Integration to scan for the latest news and articles.

prompts.name: Operating Performance
prompts.description: Benchmark operating performance metrics like margins, efficiency, and growth across an industry.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Operating Performance
- Gross, operating, and net margin quartiles
- Revenue growth vs. profitability matrix
- Asset turnover and efficiency ratios

instructions.markdown: Use Chart Rendering to visualize the performance matrix.

prompts.name: TSR
prompts.description: Analyze Total Shareholder Return (TSR) for an industry and its key drivers.

preview.markdown:
### Industry TSR Analysis
- De-composition of TSR into growth, margin, and multiple
- TSR performance vs. peers and benchmark
- Contribution of dividends and buybacks

instructions.markdown: Provides a deeper dive into the components of TSR than the standard perspective prompt.

prompts.name: Analyst Sentiment
prompts.description: Get a raw feed of analyst sentiment data for an industry, including individual ratings and price targets.

preview.markdown:
### Raw Analyst Sentiment Data
- Table of analyst ratings per company
- Distribution of price targets
- Recent upgrades and downgrades

instructions.markdown: This prompt provides un-curated, raw data for deeper analysis, contrasting with the curated sentiment prompt.

prompts.name: Industry Context
prompts.description: Provide a high-level overview of an industry, including its size, major players, and value chain.

preview.markdown:
### High-Level Industry Context
- Market size and projected growth (CAGR)
- Key segments and their descriptions
- Top 5 players by market share

instructions.markdown: A good starting point for understanding a new industry.

prompts.name: Industry Transparency
prompts.description: Assess the level of financial and operational transparency in an industry.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Transparency Scorecard
- Commonality of KPI reporting
- Quality of financial disclosures
- Level of segment reporting detail

instructions.markdown: Helps in understanding the risks associated with information asymmetry in an industry.

prompts.name: Market Cap
prompts.description: Analyze the market capitalization distribution and trends for an industry.

preview.markdown:
### Industry Market Cap Analysis
- Distribution of companies by market cap bucket
- Historical evolution of total industry market cap
- Concentration of market cap in top players

instructions.markdown: Enable Chart Rendering to visualize the distributions.

prompts.name: TAM/SAM/SOM (Top-Down)
prompts.description: Estimates market layers using public data and assumptions.

preview.markdown:
# TAM/SAM/SOM
- State assumptions; show sensitivity ranges.

instructions.markdown: Optional: Enable **Web URL Integration** for latest market reports.

prompts.name: Bottom-Up Cohort Sizing
prompts.description: Build cohort-based adoption and revenue stacks.

preview.markdown:
## Cohort Sizing
- Define cohorts â†’ adoption â†’ ARPU â†’ revenue.

instructions.markdown: Enable **Chart Rendering** for stacked area visuals.

prompts.name: LTV Driver Tree
prompts.description: Decompose LTV into acquisition, retention, and monetization levers.

preview.markdown:
### LTV Driver Tree
- Show levers, KPIs, and sensitivities.

instructions.markdown: No special tools required.

prompts.name: Churn Cohort Table
prompts.description: Visualize retention curves and cohort-based churn.

preview.markdown:
## Cohort Retention
- Month 0 to 24 retention table and curve.

instructions.markdown: Enable **Chart Rendering** for retention curves.

prompts.name: CSAT & NPS Summary
prompts.description: Summarize survey results and key drivers.

preview.markdown:
### CSAT & NPS Summary
- Score distributions and verbatim themes.

instructions.markdown: Optional logging recommended for audit trail.

categories.label: Complex Analysis
categories.description: Structured deep-dives that synthesize qualitative and quantitative signals.

prompts.name: Value Thesis
prompts.description: Articulate a concise yet rigorous investment thesis for a single company.

preview.markdown:
### Value Thesis
- Business model
- Drivers & risks
- Valuation and catalysts

instructions.markdown: Use bullet-led structure; bold key numbers.

categories.label: Analyst Themes
categories.description: Prompts that summarize, cluster, and reflect street themes and expectations.

prompts.name: 1 Year Analyst Themes Categorization
prompts.description: Cluster and label the last 12 months of analyst themes and narratives.

preview.markdown:
## 1Y Analyst Themes
- Extract recurring topics, sentiment, and catalysts

instructions.markdown: Return a taxonomy (3â€“6 parent themes, 2â€“4 sub-themes each) with coverage ratios.

categories.label: Value Profile
categories.description: Company-level facts, drivers, and qualitative context that shape value creation.

prompts.name: Earnings Calls
prompts.description: Summarize key themes, management tone, and guidance from recent earnings calls.

preview.markdown:
### Earnings Call Summary
- Key topics from prepared remarks
- Q&A session highlights and sentiment analysis
- Changes in guidance and outlook

instructions.markdown: Requires Earnings Call Transcript Access tool to be enabled.

prompts.name: Expert Guidance
prompts.description: Synthesize guidance from a curated list of experts on a company's strategy and prospects.

preview.markdown:
### Expert Guidance Synthesis
- Summary of bull and bear cases from experts
- Key debates and controversies
- Quotes from influential analysts or industry leaders

instructions.markdown: This prompt uses a pre-defined set of expert sources.

prompts.name: Facts
prompts.description: Generate a quick fact sheet for a company, including key financial and operating metrics.

preview.markdown:
### Company Fact Sheet
- HQ, CEO, Year Founded
- Key Financials (Revenue, EBITDA, Net Income)
- Key Operating Metrics (e.g., Subscribers, MAU)

instructions.markdown: Provides a simple, scannable overview of a company.

prompts.name: History
prompts.description: Summarize a company's history, focusing on key strategic shifts and historical performance.

preview.markdown:
### Company History
- Founding and early years
- Major strategic pivots and M&A
- Stock performance since IPO

instructions.markdown: Provides important context for the company's current position.

prompts.name: Industry Context
prompts.description: Analyze the company's position within its industry context, including market share and competitive landscape.

preview.markdown:
### Company's Industry Context
- Estimated market share and rank
- Key competitors and their strengths/weaknesses
- Industry growth and trends

instructions.markdown: Connects the company-specific view to the broader industry picture.

prompts.name: People
prompts.description: Provide an overview of the key executives and board members, including their backgrounds and tenure.

preview.markdown:
### Key People
- Profile of the CEO (background, tenure, approval rating)
- Overview of the executive team
- Analysis of the board's composition and independence

instructions.markdown: Helps assess the quality and stability of the leadership team.

prompts.name: Quality Checklist
prompts.description: Run a company through a predefined quality checklist, scoring it on various qualitative and quantitative factors.

preview.markdown:
### Investment Quality Checklist
- Business Model Strength (Score: 8/10)
- Management Quality (Score: 9/10)
- Financial Health (Score: 7/10)

instructions.markdown: The checklist is based on common quality investing principles.

prompts.name: Segment analysis
prompts.description: Break down a company's revenue and profitability by its reported business segments.

preview.markdown:
### Business Segment Analysis
- Revenue and growth by segment
- Profitability (e.g., operating margin) by segment
- Key products and services in each segment

instructions.markdown: Enable Chart Rendering to visualize the segment breakdown.

prompts.name: TSR
prompts.description: Analyze a company's Total Shareholder Return (TSR) and its drivers.

preview.markdown:
### Company TSR Analysis
- Historical TSR vs. peers and index
- Decomposition of TSR into fundamental drivers
- Impact of capital allocation on TSR

instructions.markdown: Provides a detailed look at the company's historical stock performance.

prompts.name: Business Model
prompts.description: Describe and analyze a company's business model, including its revenue streams and value proposition.

preview.markdown:
### Business Model Canvas
- Customer Segments
- Value Proposition
- Revenue Streams
- Key Activities & Resources

instructions.markdown: Uses the Business Model Canvas framework for a structured overview.

prompts.name: Capital Allocation
prompts.description: Analyze a company's capital allocation strategy, including investments and shareholder returns.

preview.markdown:
### Capital Allocation Strategy
- Capex and R&D as a % of sales
- History of M&A and divestitures
- Dividend and buyback policy and history

instructions.markdown: Helps to understand management's priorities and capital discipline.

prompts.name: Expectations
prompts.description: Summarize sell-side analyst expectations for a company's upcoming earnings and key metrics.

preview.markdown:
### Analyst Expectations
- Consensus EPS and revenue estimates
- 'Whisper numbers' if available
- Key debates heading into the earnings print

instructions.markdown: Provides a snapshot of what the market is expecting.

prompts.name: Financial Health
prompts.description: Assess a company's financial health using key balance sheet and cash flow metrics.

preview.markdown:
### Financial Health Check
- Leverage ratios (e.g., Debt/EBITDA)
- Liquidity ratios (e.g., Current Ratio)
- Cash flow generation and quality

instructions.markdown: Provides a quick assessment of financial risk.

prompts.name: Operating KPIs
prompts.description: Track and visualize a company's key non-financial operating KPIs over time.

preview.markdown:
### Operating KPI Tracker
- Chart of Monthly Active Users (MAU)
- Chart of Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
- Table of other relevant KPIs

instructions.markdown: Enable Chart Rendering to visualize the KPI trends.

prompts.name: Operating Performance
prompts.description: Analyze a company's operating performance, including revenue growth, margins, and efficiency.

preview.markdown:
### Operating Performance Review
- Revenue growth decomposition
- Gross, operating, and net margin trends
- Return on invested capital (ROIC) analysis

instructions.markdown: A comprehensive look at how well the company is running its business.

prompts.name: Value Drivers
prompts.description: Identify and analyze the key drivers of value for a company.

preview.markdown:
### Key Value Drivers
- Identification of the 3-5 most important value drivers
- Sensitivity analysis of each driver on valuation
- Discussion of the sustainability of each driver

instructions.markdown: Focuses on the most critical factors for the company's valuation.
